title: Board Game-Based Computational Thinking Education Design

context.additional_context: Board game-based classes to strengthen computational thinking linked with language education.

learning_goals: Design and create board games that solve real-world problems using algorithmic principles at least three times
Share problem-solving strategies with peers that incorporate computational thinking elements (decomposition, pattern recognition, abstraction, algorithmization)
Complete at least one project connecting programming concepts to language learning contexts
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
